item.description:
HIke the Glencliff trail from Glencliff. Route 25 Glencliff NH. About 8 miles RT with 3000 ft ele gain. We may encounter some snow and ice, so yaktraks, stabilicers or microspikes are strongly recommended. In Glencliff on rte 25, turn onto Sanitarium Road (look for a sign for the New Hampshire Home for the Elderly). Pass the left turn for the North & South Road, then park on the right in the parking area (WMNF parking fee required). Email for carpool.
Please bring headlamps too icase we run late in the afternoon. Short days this time of year.

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Hike Mt Moosilauke
